Articles.Content:
Hi Guys

I have just started playing the KSP Beta and I have run into a few proplems that I assume are bugs.

The most major of these problems it that when I am trying to complete the contract where you need to "Test the Rockomax BACC Solid Fuel Boosters in Flight Over Kerbin". I am flying with all of the test conditions ticked yet the contract dosent turn green and complete.

Any replies would be appreciated.

Thanks
Please see this thread. Parts tests are covered near the end of the OP.
